raw_body: REV. SISTER MARY THEOPHANE A.C. (nee MARIA ROSELINE CROOS) was called to her Eternal Rest on 18th February 2024. Requiem Mass will be offered on 19th of February 2024 at 3 p.m. at Carmel Convent,​ Colombo 10,​ followed by interment at Ganeral Cemetery,​ Borella (Carmel Convent,​ 88,​ Ananda Rajakaruna Mawatha,​ Colombo 10).012251
